com.ibm.webest.persistence.service.impl
Class SolutionFacade

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.persistence.service.impl.SolutionFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolutionFacadeLocal, SolutionFacadeRemote
@DeclareRoles(value={"admin","estimator","manager"})
@RolesAllowed(value={"admin","estimator","manager"})
public class SolutionFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements SolutionFacadeRemote, SolutionFacadeLocal

SolutionFacade includes the SQL query to Solution.

Author:
Wail Shakir
